title: #256 - Jay Larson & ME
description:
Comedian Jay Larson and I hang out in the Mancave, have a cigar and talk about his new special "Me Being ME" available October 20th at http://www.jaylarsoncomedy.com for ONLY $6, how hard it is to make friends, #SoberOctobert, Virtue Signaling, that time his mom spit in his face, John Cena, and I plan my funeral.

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com

To Follow me on..

Twitter: https://twitter.com/bertkreischer

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer/?hl=en

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/Akreischer
